Translations.Text: Hav vi not those fled their hejm! - Kvankam ili est 1000 - Tim death? DI dir al them MORT TIAM revived them! DI DUSX His grace POPOL PLEJ POPOL est unappreciative
Vi batal ig DI kon ti DI est Hearer Knower
Who would lend DI prunt righteousness al gxi repaid them multiplied manifold DI EST UNU PROVIZ withholds Him VI returned

Vi not estr Israel Moses Ili dir al their prophet vi appoint regx plumb us ni batal ig DI. Li dir Est gxi your intention batal dekret vi vi ne batal? Ili dir should ni ne batal ig DI when ni deprived de our hejm our infan? Sed when batal dekret them ili torn a few DI est aware da transgressors

Their prophet dir al them DI appointed Taloot (Saul) est your regx. Ili dir Kiel can li hav kingship us when ni est worthy de kingship than li; li est ne eben ricx? Li dir DI chosen him vi ben him abundance knowledge en korp DI grants His kingship whomever Li vol! DI est Bounteous Omniscient

Their prophet dir al them sign his kingship est ti Ark Covenant restored vi bringing assurances your Lord relics las popol de Moses popol Aaron. Gxi port angxel. This konvink sign vi se vi est really believers
